segments.text: The girl looks so hopeful, standing there with her hand out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for her if the boy doesn’t share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s just watching him, waiting for her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he gives her at least one cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is so unstable, and she’s just standing there like it’s normal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t seem to care about the water on the floor either.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s ever fallen before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely missing this whole scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the girl gets her cookie before they all get in trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is kind of heartbreaking to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR
